block_storage_instance_no.description: Block storage instance No for creating snapshot.

description.description: Descriptions on a snapshot to create

instance_status_name.description: Block Storage Snapshot Instance Status Name

name.description: Block storage snapshot name to create. default : Ncloud assigns default values.

algorithm_type.description: Load balancer algorithm type code. The available algorithms are as follows: [ROUND ROBIN (RR) | LEAST_CONNECTION (LC)]. Default: ROUND ROBIN (RR)

description.description: Description of a load balancer to create

internet_line_type.description: Internet line identification code. PUBLC(Public), GLBL(Global). default : PUBLC(Public)

name.description: Name of a load balancer to create. Default: Automatically specified by Ncloud.

network_usage_type.description: Network usage identification code. PBLIP(PublicIp), PRVT(PrivateIP). default : PBLIP(PublicIp)

region.description: Region code. Get available values using the `data ncloud_regions`.

server_instance_no_list.description: List of server instance numbers to be bound to the load balancer

certificate_name.description: Load balancer SSL certificate. Required when the protocol_type value is SSL/HTTPS.

l7_health_check_path.description: Health check path of load balancer rules. Required when the protocol_type is HTTP/HTTPS.

load_balancer_port.description: Load balancer port of load balancer rules

protocol_type.description: Protocol type code of load balancer rules. The following codes are available. [HTTP | HTTPS | TCP | SSL]

proxy_protocol_use_yn.description: Use 'Y' if you want to check client IP addresses by enabling the proxy protocol while you select TCP or SSL.

server_port.description: Server port of load balancer rules

block.description: Load balancer rules are required to create a load balancer.

certificate_chain.description: Chainca certificate (Required if the certificate is issued with a chainca)

certificate_name.description: Name of a certificate to add

key_name.description: Key name to generate. If the generated key name exists, an error occurs.

port_forwarding_internal_port.description: Internal port for port forwarding. Only the following ports are available. [Linux: `22` | Windows: `3389`]

server_instance_no.description: Server instance number for which port forwarding is set

name.description: Subnet name to create. default: Assigned by NAVER CLOUD PLATFORM.

vpc_no.description: The id of the VPC that the desired subnet belongs to.

ipv4_cidr_block.description: The CIDR block for the vpc.

name.description: Subnet name to create. default: Assigned by NAVER CLOUD PLATFORM.

access_control_groups.description: A List of access control group configuration no

configuration_no_list.description: List of ACG configuration numbers you want to get

name.description: Name of the ACG you want to get

access_control_group_configuration_no.description: Access control group setting number to search

access_control_group_name.description: Access control group name to search

source_configuration_no.description: Source access control rule configuration no

source_name_regex.description: A regex string to apply to the source access control rule list returned by ncloud

access_control_group_configuration_no.description: Access control group setting number to search

access_control_rules.description: A list of access control rules configuration no

source_name_regex.description: A regex string to apply to the ACG rule list returned by ncloud

block_storage_total_rows.description: Member server image block storage total rows

block_storage_total_size.description: Member server image block storage total size

name_regex.description: A regex string to apply to the member server image list returned by ncloud

no_list.description: List of member server images to view

original_base_block_storage_disk_type.description: Original base block storage disk type

platform_type_code_list.description: List of platform codes of server images to view

region.description: Region code. Get available values using the `data ncloud_regions`.

member_server_images.description: A list of Member server image no

name_regex.description: A regex string to apply to the member server image list returned by ncloud

no_list.description: List of member server images to view

output_file.description: The name of file that can save data source after running `terraform plan`.

platform_type_code_list.description: List of platform codes of server images to view

region.description: Region code. Get available values using the `data ncloud_regions`.

zone.description: Zone code. Get available values using the `data ncloud_zones`.

region.description: Region code. Get available values using the `data ncloud_regions`.

zone.description: Zone code. Get available values using the `data ncloud_zones`.

name.description: The name of the field to filter by.

network_acl_no.description: List of Network ACL ID to retrieve.

vpc_no.description: The VPC ID that you want to filter from.

zone.description: Zone code. Get available values using the `data ncloud_zones`.

zone.description: Zone code. Get available values using the `data ncloud_zones`.

name.description: Subnet name to create. default: Assigned by NAVER CLOUD PLATFORM.

network_acl_no.description: Network ACL No. Get available values using the `default_network_acl_no` from Resource `ncloud_vpc` or Data source `data.ncloud_network_acls`.

subnet.description: The CIDR block for the subnet.

subnet_no.description: List of subnet ID to retrieve

usage_type.description: Usage type. GEN(Normal), LOADB(Load Balance), BM(BareMetal). default : GEN(Normal).

vpc_no.description: The VPC ID that you want to filter from

zone.description: Available Zone. Get available values using the `data ncloud_zones`.

ipv4_cidr_block.description: The CIDR block for the vpc.
